pages.text: Forgero comes with tables to make creating and upgrading tools easier. There is currently one one table available, but more are being added

pages.title: Assembly station
pages.text: The assembly table is a multi block table which allows you to disassemble and assemble tools. Placing tools or parts in the singular slot, will disassemble it into its components. Be aware, breaking parts into their materials will only yield 1 material. Only tools with 100% durability can be disassembled.
